attributes.action: Ban driving with any level of alcohol
attributes.additional_details:
Drinking any amount of alcohol and driving should not be allowed. Why even allow any amount, what does this achieve?

By making it totally illegal it will minimize the risks. Currently a person knows they can have some so will do so but actually has no idea if they are over or not because it effects every person differently.

The victims of drink driving our far too often the innocent and this needs to stop.
